column4: I'm having trouble understanding how I can extend my boot partion with gparted in live CD mode. Resize sure doesn't work :/
I've just used clonezilla to move my installation to a new hdd btw
It may have something to do with the new hdds, UUID being different form the old hdds, UUID?
I dunno, it's odd. How would one usually go about resizing the boot partion? I can only make it smaller
